Text: Thank YouThanks so much for taking time from your busy schedule to meet with us last week We are extremely excited about the possibility of exploring partnerships between the Bauer College and Enron and feel that we can do so to both of our benefits As we mentioned we currently have a number of Centers of Excellence in Energy Technology ManagementeBusiness Entrepreneurship and Innovation and Professional Selling that could flourish with investments by key business partners such as Enron We look forward to discussing these opportunities with you at the appropriate time Jerry Jerry R Strawser Interim Dean Arthur Andersen Co Alumni Professor CT Bauer College of Business University of Houston Phone Fax wwwcbauhedujerry
